name: Rocket Star: Idle Tycoon Games
description:
Download the BEST IDLE GAME and lead your rocket company to the edges of the galaxy!

ROCKET STAR is an addictive tycoon game where you bring the best talents to work on your spaceship factory. Your team will build advanced rockets while you research new technologies and launch lots of spaceships to discover new planets!

Manage your space center and GET FREE IDLE CASH to keep your progression even when you're away or offline - no internet connection is required! Boost the spacecraft production, fire all thrusters on the launchpad and send your rockets to the stars.

In this FUN SIMULATION GAME, the most challenging missions await you! To become the next star tycoon, and set foot on the Moon, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn and beyond, your factory will have to make a lot of profit and craft many starships. START THE QUEST for rocket crafting now and explore the universe!

TAP, BUILD & LAUNCH! Lead your empire in the BEST CLICKER GAME available. Conquer the galaxy with your own space rocket company simulator! Play this cool incremental game now and join the space exploration race!

Features:

Idle Factory Sim
+ Set your team to work while you're away and get idle cash.
+ UPGRADE YOUR FACTORY to boost rockets production.
+ Manage resources and automate work to maximize money income and launch more ships!
+ Watch as your rocket is built in real-time with amazing 3D graphics!
+ Play offline if no Internet is available.

Space Program
+ TONS OF MISSIONS to explore: Launch satellites, build a Moon base, colonize Mars, send cool stuff to other planets.
+ Hire genius scientists and great entrepreneurs to work on your company.
+ Have fun watching you mission launch from the command center.

Follow Rocket Star: the best idle game!
Facebook > fb.me/rocket.star.idle.game

Have a problem? Want to suggest a cool new feature? Send your feedback to Pixodust Games. We love to hear from our players! support@pixodust.com

BE SURE TO CHECK FOR UPDATES. We're always working on improving gameplay and adding new features!

Download Rocket Star Idle Factory now and take the space race to your device!
